title: Find your IRL friends in League now

replies.body: What if I have no friends? {{champion:32}}
We will be friends then{{champion:1}}
I can't find my kind on facebook {{champion:72}}
I can't find my friends either. Now that I think about it, I can't really find anything {{champion:64}}
Still better for me than a voice chat feature{{champion:37}}
{{champion:111}} Maybe now I can find those assholes who abandoned me and left me for dead.
you think that's bad? of the two friends i have that are still alive, one went insane and the other never leaves his lane to say hi {{champion:268}}
{{champion:421}} ...
I hope I am remembered...{{champion:83}}
I think it's time for me to blow up my friend's inboxes again.{{champion:115}}
All my friends that poke me end up dying. Facebook isnt great :/ {{champion:27}}
what if you don't have facebook?
{{champion:26}}    All in good time.
I bet that stings, doesn't it?

Amumu is so lonely... {{champion:103}} wont charm you. {{champion:53}}  wont grab you. {{champion:31}}  wont eat you.{{champion:26}} wont ult you. {{champion:14}}  ults just to get away from you. {{champion:59}}  ults himself to stay away from you.{{champion:34}}   uses her wall to keep you away.... And {{champion:89}} looks at herself to blind herself so that she can pretend amumu isnt there... Its so sad :'(
{{champion:17}} self-cast blind dart
don't forget {{champion:67}}  pushes Amumu away with Condemn
WHO NEEDS FRIENDS WHEN YOU HAVE VILLAINY?! {{champion:45}}
You can have both!{{champion:117}}
Sounds like someone got the short end of the friendship stick.
IS THAT A SHORT JOKE?
You stole my name.....
Obviously not since you're BranFlakes**016**
according to you, your the 16th out of hundreds of branflakes.

I'll eat you
- Kha'Zix {{champion:121}}

When every Facebook-linked feature seemingly wants to post to our FB, access our friends list, constantly harass with suggestions, and utilise our metrics data, I must say (as a cybersecurity specialist) that your stance of giving us a tool simply to add value to the community experience in League is both refreshing and commendable.  

Well done, Riot.  Kudos and thank you.
"Mom? You play league!?" {{champion:421}}
You discover your dad mains Sleigh Bell {{champion:55}}
not my dad anymore
ur ***NOT*** my dad{{summoner:6}}
Then you check her rankings and she's a Korean challenger.
I killed all my friends....
Well if you got a penta it's probably worth
You sir just won the internet
RIP wallet... oh wait, this is free?
The unseen block is the deadliest{{champion:238}}

yay, a new great way to burn my friendships IRL to the ground

thanks rito :P
wurf
The Turkey server is like a lab rat.
"lab of rats" FTFY
*Lab of turkeys
I dont know why they just dont do what everyone wants,why don't they add a voice chat option to leauge?
i would rather not listen to a random bunch of 12 year olds flaming eachother and fucking eachothers mothers every single game, if i wanted that i would go listen to justin biebers full album.

dota 2 has a voice feature and when i used to play it, and was still a noob at it, i actually had some really mature people talk and help me through it, was really good, who says league wouldn't be the same?
But mac
Well, I'm sure that if a Voice Chat would be put in place those who are being bullied might be protected by the others in the chat, and can be recorded for even more strict punishments.
You seem to have a distorted view of "everyone" in regards to this topic.
TY riot for letting everyone know straight up that you wont share info and all that. i get tired of companies just avoiding things like that. so thanks for just saying it.
